channel.title: Random Items from Object

item.title: Random Items from Object
item.dc:creator: @ITI_Basak_ITI ITI Basak ITI
item.description:
@ITI_Basak_ITI wrote:

Ok I am a beginner at coding but Im learning Ive been able to successfully create this code

    case 6420:
            if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(6754,1)){
                    c.getItems().deleteItem(6754, 1);
                    c.getItems().addItem(4151, 1);
            }
            break;

This code makes it so that when I use a certain item on an object, it deletes the item and gives me a whip (4151). I made the whip just for learning purposes. I would like the object to give me 1 of 4 random items. How do I place the 4 items in this code and make it so it gives the player 1 random item?

Read full topic
